title: 我的世界:故事模式第二季第二章 已经发布
author: ⑨
txt_content:
本帖最后由 xiaosung1234 于 2017-8-21 18:19 编辑 

Episode Two of 'Minecraft: Story Mode - Season Two' Now Available for Download!
我的世界故事模式第二季第二章现在已经开放下载
英文原文
Hey adventurers, your story continues today! Jesse and the gang survived the Sea Temple, but they brought home a little more than they bargained for: a lost adventurer, a powerful device, and a colossal enemy capable of grinding Beacontown to dust. There may be more to this fearsome foe than meets the eye, but to find out, Jesse -- together with a few trusty friends -- must embark on another adventure, this time into the icy unknown... Download episode two to face The Admin now!

中文翻译
嘿，冒险者，你的故事今天仍在继续！Jesse和海底神庙的幸存者，但他们带回去的东西比他们想到的更多：失去的冒险家，一个极为强大的物品，和一个能将灯塔镇变成粉末的巨人。这个可怕的敌人可能比眼前的还要多，如果想要获得答案，Jesse就必须和他的朋友们开始另一场冒险，这次的冒险将在未知的寒冷中展开…

一些可能会需要的东西
游戏正版购买地址:http://store.steampowered.com/ap ... y_Mode__Season_Two/

Minecraft:Story Mode - Season Two 第二章配置要求
操作系统:Windows 7 SP1 或更高
处理器: Intel Core 2 Duo 2.4GHz
运行内存: 3 GB RAM
Graphics: 
Nvidia GTS 450+ with 1024MB+ VRAM (excluding GT)
Intel HD Graphics 4000+
DirectX: Version 11
Storage: 10 GB available space
Sound Card: Direct X 11 sound device




机翻 人工润色 标注(?)的是我没搞明白的地方

replies.author: mr鲁鲁
replies.txt_content:
beacontown是故事模式里那个镇子的名字....
“一个能把灯塔镇碾成尘土的巨大敌人”？
